item.title: Why America gets a ‘D’ grade when it comes to retirement
item.description: U.S. adults are generally underprepared to live well in older age, according to a new report.

item.title: Weight-loss drugs shook up the stock market. Menopause treatments could be next.
item.description: Hims & Hers is taking aim at menopause and perimenopause in an attempt to tap in to a huge and potentially highly lucrative market.

item.title: ‘I watch antenna TV’: I’m 66. Will I lose my disability benefits if Social Security goes belly up?
item.description: “I read that the Social Security Disability Insurance Trust Fund is good until 2099.”
